node.excerpt: There are [different ways](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/blog/2018-04-10-how-to-handle-comments-in-gatsby-blogs/) to add a comments section to your static website or blog, in this guide we will focus on how to use [Disqus](https://disqus.com) to enable users to leave comments on a blog generated with [GatsbyJS](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/).

frontmatter.title: Add Disqus comments to a GatsbyJS static blog
